aboutDescription.para1: A 3D voxel-based space shooter featuring both a thrilling single-player campaign and intense competitive multiplayer, developed during my time as a Unity Developer
aboutDescription.para2: Space Conqueror is a space-themed game where players control a spaceship to attack enemies while dodging incoming fire. The game emphasizes quick reflexes and strategic maneuvering to survive and progress through various levels. Players must navigate through space, manage their ship's resources, and eliminate adversaries to achieve high scores and complete missions. The gameplay focuses on providing an engaging and challenging experience for those interested in space combat scenarios.

detailedInfo.subtitle: Detailed Info
detailedInfo.title: Information
detailedInfo.mainDescription: Drawing inspiration from Midnite Oil Software's tutorials (His Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@midniteoilsoftware), I developed this game, enhancing it with additional features and integrating networking capabilities using Photon Unity Networking (PUN).

items: Combat encounters (enemy composition, waves, retreating, etc.)
Implementing enemy AI using a finite state machine
Optimized resource management with object pooling
Enhancing performance with Universal Render Pipeline (URP)
Building cross-platform support for PC and WebGL
Seamless player management powered by Azure PlayFab
Real-time multiplayer integration with Photon Unity Networking (PUN)
